statements: SELECT * FROM sensor_alerts WHERE sensor_type = 'temperature';
SELECT sensor_id, reading_value FROM sensor_alerts WHERE reading_value > 50;
SELECT * FROM sensor_alerts WHERE reading_timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT alert_id, sensor_id FROM sensor_alerts WHERE alert_message LIKE '%critical%';
SELECT sensor_id, reading_value, reading_timestamp FROM sensor_alerts ORDER BY reading_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT sensor_id, reading_value, reading_timestamp FROM sensor_alerts WHERE sensor_type = 'temperature' ORDER BY reading_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, reading_value FROM sensor_alerts WHERE reading_timestamp > '2022-01-01' AND reading_value > 50 ORDER BY reading_value ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, reading_value, reading_timestamp FROM sensor_alerts WHERE reading_value BETWEEN 20 AND 30 AND sensor_type = 'humidity' ORDER BY reading_timestamp DESC;

SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, reading_value, reading_timestamp FROM sensor_alerts WHERE sensor_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND reading_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01' ORDER BY reading_timestamp DESC LIMIT 20;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, reading_value, alert_message FROM sensor_alerts WHERE alert_message IS NOT NULL AND sensor_type = 'pressure' ORDER BY reading_value ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM sensor_readings;
SELECT sensor_id, value, location, reading_time FROM sensor_readings ORDER BY sensor_id DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, value, reading_time FROM sensor_readings WHERE value > 50;
SELECT location, reading_time FROM sensor_readings WHERE location = 'Room A' ORDER BY reading_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM alerts WHERE alert_time >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY alert_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensor_readings ORDER BY reading_time DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, AVG(value) FROM sensor_readings GROUP BY sensor_id;
SELECT * FROM sensor_readings WHERE value > 50 AND location = 'Room A' ORDER BY reading_time ASC;
SELECT sensor_id, AVG(value) FROM sensor_readings WHERE location IN ('Room A', 'Room B') GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING AVG(value) > 30;
SELECT a.alert_id, a.alert_message, s.sensor_id, s.value FROM alerts a INNER JOIN sensor_readings s ON a.sensor_id = s.sensor_id ORDER BY a.alert_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensor_readings;
SELECT sensor_id, reading_timestamp FROM sensor_readings ORDER BY reading_timestamp DESC;
SELECT reading_value FROM sensor_readings WHERE sensor_id = 1;
SELECT sensor_id, anomaly_timestamp, anomaly_details FROM anomalies ORDER BY anomaly_timestamp ASC;
SELECT alert_message, is_resolved FROM alerts WHERE is_resolved = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM sensor_readings ORDER BY reading_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sensor_id, reading_value FROM sensor_readings WHERE reading_value > 50 ORDER BY sensor_id ASC;
SELECT sensor_id, reading_timestamp, reading_value FROM sensor_readings WHERE reading_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND reading_value BETWEEN 20 AND 30;
SELECT AVG(reading_value) AS average_reading_value FROM sensor_readings;

SELECT anomalies.anomaly_id, sensor_readings.sensor_id, reading_timestamp, reading_value, anomaly_timestamp, anomaly_details FROM anomalies INNER JOIN sensor_readings ON anomalies.sensor_id = sensor_readings.sensor_id ORDER BY anomaly_timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM SensorReadings;
SELECT sensor_id, reading_value, reading_time FROM SensorReadings ORDER BY reading_time DESC;
SELECT sensor_location, sensor_id, reading_value FROM SensorReadings WHERE reading_value > 50;
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_type FROM Sensors WHERE sensor_location = 'Lab A';
SELECT rule_name, sensor_parameter, abnormal_threshold FROM AlertRules ORDER BY abnormal_threshold DESC;
SELECT * FROM SensorReadings WHERE reading_value > 50 ORDER BY reading_time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sensor_location, AVG(reading_value) as avg_reading FROM SensorReadings GROUP BY sensor_location;
SELECT * FROM Sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature' AND sensor_location = 'Room A' ORDER BY sensor_name;
SELECT sensor_name, COUNT(alert_id) as alert_count FROM Sensors s JOIN Alerts a ON s.sensor_id = a.sensor_id GROUP BY sensor_name ORDER BY alert_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM AlertRules WHERE abnormal_threshold > 100 AND sensor_parameter = 'humidity' ORDER BY rule_name;
SELECT * FROM SensorReadings
SELECT reading_timestamp, reading_value FROM SensorReadings WHERE sensor_id = 1
SELECT sensor_id, MAX(reading_value) AS max_reading_value FROM SensorReadings GROUP BY sensor_id
SELECT * FROM CropDiseases WHERE disease_name LIKE '%rust%'
SELECT system_name, irrigation_capacity FROM IrrigationSystems
SELECT * FROM SensorReadings ORDER BY reading_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT sensor_id, reading_value, location FROM SensorReadings WHERE reading_value > 50 AND location = 'Field A';
SELECT DISTINCT disease_name, disease_symptoms FROM CropDiseases WHERE affected_crops LIKE '%Tomato%';
SELECT system_name, irrigation_capacity FROM IrrigationSystems ORDER BY irrigation_capacity DESC;
SELECT a.alert_id, a.alert_message, s.reading_value FROM Alerts a JOIN SensorReadings s ON a.sensor_id = s.sensor_id WHERE s.reading_value < 30;
